column5: hey guys just wanted to make an introductory thread.   Where can I catch speckles in k-w....     Ok, just kidding . I have recently got into fishing again and am trying to get out as much as I possibly can this year despite being a broke college student living in kitchener has given me many opportunities close to home through public transit. My Grandfather and Uncle got me into fishing at a young age but being busy with hockey most of my life I did not get much fishing done until recently. In the past few years I have done a lot of bass and carp fishing on the grand river with some success. I also have a yearly cottage trip with some buddies to Big Clear lake for some great pass and pike fishing. I am looking to get into fishing for trout this year and am going out for opening weekend to the saguean to try my hand at it!  I look forward to learning a lot from the experienced members here, sharing reports... and asking a lot of questions!  Josh- fish on!
Glad to see you climbed aboard!!!!,lot's of great help here !
Im not so much looking for spots as google earth is pretty easy to use, just far as small tips and techniques! lurked here for a little bit but was time to sign up!
Google map has been my friend. Amazing where you can access some places.  OOPS  WELCOME
hahaha, that is funny. hey it is april fools? I just see what happens when ppl ask for spots on their first post, figured I would clown around.    Josh
Welcome. Not all the nuts are on trees around here.
